name: sulphurous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
containing or similar to sulphur (= a pale yellow chemical element): A sulphurous smell filled the air. Wafts of sulphurous fumes were coming from the volcano. See
sulphur
More examplesFewer examplesA sulphurous stench filled her lungs.Venezuelan oil is heavy and sulphurous.The air around him was a sulphurous yellow shroud.
